Class Hex

java.lang.Object
  org.energy_home.jemma.javagal.layers.data.implementations.Utils.Hex

public class Hex
extends java.lang.Object

Utility class providing help methods on hexadecimal conversions.

Author:
"Ing. Marco Nieddu or from Consoft Sistemi S.P.A., financed by EIT ICT Labs activity SecSES - Secure Energy Systems (activity id 13030)"

Method Detail

byteToHex

public static java.lang.String byteToHex(byte[] data,
                                         int i)
Converts a portion of a byte[] to its String representation. The resulting String will contain the hexadecimal representation of the bytes from index i to the end of the array.

Parameters:
data - the byte[] to convert.
i - the starting index.
Returns:
the resulting String representation.

byteToHex

public static java.lang.String byteToHex(byte[] data,
                                         int i,
                                         int len)
Converts a portion of a byte[] to its String representation. The resulting String will contain the hexadecimal representation of the next len bytes starting from index i.

Please note that no control about array bounds is made so i + len must be less than the array length. Is up to the developer to comply with this rule.

Parameters:
data - the byte[] to convert.
i - the starting index.
len - the number of bytes to convert.
Returns:
the resulting String representation.

byteToHex

public static java.lang.String byteToHex(byte[] data)
Converts a byte[] to its String representation. The resulting String will contain the hexadecimal representation of all bytes contained.

Parameters:
data - the byte[] to convert.
Returns:
the resulting String representation.

toHexChar

public static char toHexChar(long i)
Converts an hexadecimal digit to a char. In particular, admitted values for the long parameter goes from 0 to 15, while returned chars varies from '0' to 'F'.

Parameters:
i - the long number to convert
Returns:
the corresponding char.

toHexString

public static java.lang.String toHexString(long value,
                                           int size)
Converts the first digits of a long number to its String hexadecimal representation.

Parameters:
value - the long number to convert.
size - the number of digits to convert from the long number provided.
Returns:
the desired String representation.
